channel.title: List of CAN ID descriptions (from OpenGarages.org)
channel.description:
Here is a really complete list of CAN IDs for a bunch of different vehicles: which is found on opengarages.org fantastic resource.
Mazda: http://www.madox.net/blog/projects/mazda-can-bus/ Ford Mondeo: http://www.electronicsworkshop.eu/FordMondeoCANhacking Toyota Prius: http://www.vassfamily.net/ToyotaPrius/CAN/PriusCodes.xls | http://students.asl.ethz.ch/upl_pdf/151-report.pdf Toyota Camry: [need link] Toyota in general: [need link] Mini cooper: https://www.defcon.org/images/defcon-21/dc-21-presentations/Staggs/DEFCON-21-Staggs-How-to-Hack-Your-Mini-Cooper-WP.pdf Ford: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/openxc/FrZA8-pDs6A Ford Radius: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aqWTyXr4O9Fnjt_ZvojrrKbXVxQZ8Ms7isXg39QUh70/edit#gid=0 Jeep Wrangler: http://chadgibbons.com/2013/12/29/hacking-the-jeep-interior-can-bus/ Dodge: http://tucrrc.utulsa.edu/DodgeCAN.html Ducati Panigale (bike): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-NJ9OlGQYTGMzBzwDPYn-aI_7_ign9SCiscKZufx3Uw/edit?pli=1 BMW http://www.carx24.de/E65_Codes.xls Subaru Diesel: https://subdiesel.wordpress.com/ecu-analysis/can-messages/ Nissan: https://github.com/Knio/carhack/blob/master/Cars/Nissan.markdown Honda: https://github.com/Knio/carhack/blob/master/Cars/Honda.markdown Bmw: http://web.archive.org/web/20041204074622/www.openbmw.org/bus/ | http://www.loopybunny.co.uk/CarPC/k_can.html GMLAN: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qEwOXSr3bWoc2VUhpuIam236OOZxPc2hxpLUsV0xkn0/edit?usp=sharing

item.title: List of CAN ID descriptions (from OpenGarages.org)
item.dc:creator: dariush_abbasi868
item.description:
Hi
I am looking for Mercedes Benz truck message IDs and also its data

I have found that it is 11-bit can and 500kb
I also logged dome IDs in bus which I do not know them and their data

6B4 6B5 4A0 4A1 4F0 4F1 3B4 3B5

could you please help me in this mater

Read full topic

item.title: List of CAN ID descriptions (from OpenGarages.org)
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
@keven check out GitHub - commaai/opendbc: democratize access to car decoder rings - they don’t have specific for the Chevy Bolt but you might be able to test the definitions for the gm_global platforms.

Read full topic

item.title: List of CAN ID descriptions (from OpenGarages.org)
item.dc:creator: keven

ok, thank you. I have cracked some can id, but there are still 1~2 ID not cracked. If you know someone has cracked the can bus signal, I can pay for it.

item.title: List of CAN ID descriptions (from OpenGarages.org)
item.dc:creator: cyclin_al1
item.description:
@keven,
I think you are going to have to find that yourself, unless someone else on this community is also working on a Bolt.

Maybe start by trying these:

Chevy Bolt EV Forum

Chevy Bolt EV Forum

We’re the Largest Chevy Bolt EV Online Community and Owner's Club. Join to discuss sport mode, reviews, battery range and charging!

Chevy Bolt EV Forum

Chevy Bolt EV Forum

Forum and Owners Group for the Chevy Bolt EV

Inside EVS Forum

Bolt EV

Join the Bolt EV discussion to chat with electric vehicle owners and enthusiasts around the globe.

Read full topic

item.title: List of CAN ID descriptions (from OpenGarages.org)
item.dc:creator: alanm
item.description:
Here is a really complete list of CAN IDs for a bunch of different vehicles: which is found on opengarages.org fantastic resource.

Mazda: Mazda CAN Bus – Madox.NET
Ford Mondeo: Ford Mondeo CAN bus hacking | www.electronicsworkshop.eu
Toyota Prius: vassfamily.net - This website is for sale! - vassfamily Resources and Information. | Authentication User | ETH Zurich
Toyota Camry: [need link]
Toyota in general: [need link]
Mini cooper: https://www.defcon.org/images/defcon-21/dc-21-presentations/Staggs/DEFCON-21-Staggs-How-to-Hack-Your-Mini-Cooper-WP.pdf
Ford: Redirecting to Google Groups
Ford Radius: FordRadioCanIds - Google Sheets
Jeep Wrangler: Hacking the Jeep Interior CAN-Bus | Chad Gibbons’ Blog
Dodge: http://tucrrc.utulsa.edu/DodgeCAN.html
Ducati Panigale (bike): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-NJ9OlGQYTGMzBzwDPYn-aI_7_ign9SCiscKZufx3Uw/edit?pli=1
BMW http://www.carx24.de/E65_Codes.xls
Subaru Diesel: https://subdiesel.wordpress.com/ecu-analysis/can-messages/
Nissan: carhack/Cars/Nissan.markdown at master · Knio/carhack · GitHub
Honda: carhack/Cars/Honda.markdown at master · Knio/carhack · GitHub
Bmw: http://web.archive.org/web/20041204074622/www.openbmw.org/bus/ | CarPC Install
GMLAN: GMLan_Bible - Google Sheets

Read full topic
